newsitem.title: CANADA: DBRS downgrades rating on Echo Bay Mines.
newsitem.headline: DBRS downgrades rating on Echo Bay Mines.

text.p: Dominion Bond Rating Service Ltd said on Monday it has downgraded its rating for Echo Bay Mines Ltd to BBB (low) from BBB (high).
The trend is stable, DBRS said in a statement.
"The downgrade reflects the continued weak operating results and the deterioration of (Echo Bay's) balance sheet," DBRS said.
The company's production costs have increased while ore grades have decreased, the rating agency said.
"Weak operating cash flow combined with increased capital expenditures have pressured the balance sheet," DBRS said.
DBRS said Echo Bay has traditionally been prudent in its use of debt and the rating agency anticipated the company would continue to ensure moderate leverage.
